title: Photograph, Drawing of a wall elevation (blind arches and the baptism of Christ), 1904–13
title_raw: Drawing of a wall elevation (blind arches and the baptism of Christ)
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: Elevation of a wall for an ecclesiastical building. Semi-circular blind wood arcade with carved wreaths on the panels. Center, a large arch with a painting of Christ's Baptism; a cross above. On the wall above, "Thou art my beloved Son in Whom I am well pleased."

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, Drawing of a wall elevation (blind arches and the baptism of Christ), 1904–13. printed on sensitized paper. 1961-83-19.
